load-maps.blurb: Players can vote on a map, and it loads.

pick-roles.blurb: Sakamoto, assassins, and targets are randomly assigned to players.

sprinting.blurb: Targets can sprint for a short duration.

pick-styles.blurb: Assassins and Sakamoto are each randomly assigned one of three hero styles, respectively.

win-condition.blurb: If all Targets die, Assassins win. If all Assassins die, Sakamoto wins (what if Sakamoto is dead first?). If the round ends, surviving Targets win.

garments.blurb: If Sakamoto dies, a Target can pick up his 'Garments' to become Sakamoto.

mind-reader.blurb: Sakamoto (rare) can detect nearby enemies within a short radius by seeing them outlined in a faint glow.

punch.blurb: Sakamoto (rare) can deal damage with a punch attack.

kick.blurb: Sakamoto (rare) can deal damage with a kick attack.

pistol.blurb: Lu Shaotang can shoot a pistol with four shots and a cooldown.

dual-pistols.blurb: Lu Shaotang has an ability to dual-wield pistols with lighter damage and more shots.

legendary-attack.blurb: Attacks that build momentum as you combo on someone (what is the attack?).

bubblegum.blurb: Sakamoto (legendary) can spit bubblegum that expands into a sticky web, trapping Assassins in place for 3 seconds.

dash.blurb: Non-legendary Assassins can quickly dash forward with a cooldown.

knife-slash.blurb: Rare assassins can deal damage by slashing with a knife.

sword-slash.blurb: Epic assassins can deal damage by slashing with a sword, which has a longer reach than a knife.

knife-stealth-kills.blurb: Rare assassins can discreetly kill someone with their knife without making any noise.

tofu-scramble.blurb: Epic assassins can do a barrage of sword attacks quickly.

sword-stealth-kills.blurb: Epic assassins can discreetly kill someone with their sword without making any noise.

camera-attack.blurb: Kanaguri can deal damage by hitting with his camera or tripod.

camera-flash.blurb: Kanaguri using his camera flash to blind others for two seconds.

camera-stealth-kills.blurb: Kanaguri can discreetly kill someone with his camera without making any noise.
